long_description: The Nola Tote Bag from Sherpani carries all your belongings with style. It features an original print by artist Cathy Nichols. Lightly embossed lining enhances canvas exterior and the external I.D.tag has matching artwork. Artwork is polyurethane-coated for scratch resistance. Zip-close main compartment; 3 zip-shut external front pockets and 2 external water bottle pockets. Sherpani Nola Tote Bag features an internal zip pocket and key fob. Made from natural-fiber, heavy cotton canvas fabric with soft vegan faux-leather trim. Vegan leather shoulder straps and removable cross-body canvas carry strap.
short_description: The Nola Tote Bag from Sherpani carries all your belongings with style. It features an original print by artist Cathy Nichols.
